channel.title: Container and layouts - Ebiten UI
channel.description: The library provides a rendering manager *ebitenui.UI in which you will place your entire UI. Manager is located in ebitenui package. 1import "github.com/ebitenui/ebitenui" Manager needs to get constantly updated and drawed. 1type Game struct { 2 ui *ebitenui.UI 3} 4 5func NewGame() *Game { 6 return &Game{ 7 ui: &ebitenui.UI{}, 8 } 9} 10 11func (g *Game) Update() error { 12 g.ui.Update() 13 return nil 14} 15 16func (g *Game) Draw(screen *ebiten.Image) { 17 g.ui.Draw(screen) 18} Any UI in this library consists of containers that are nested in each other.
